**Source** [GM Core](/Sources.aspx?ID=218) pg. 305 <sup>2.0</sup>

<row gap="medium">

**Usage** held in 1 hand

**Bulk** 1
</row>

<row gap="medium">
**Base Weapon** [Longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=386)
</row>

<row gap="medium">

 

 

 
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Perception** +11; precise vision 30 feet, imprecise hearing 30 feet

**Communication** speech (Common and four other common languages)

**Skills** [Performance](/Skills.aspx?ID=12) +15

**Int** +2, **Wis** +2, **Cha** +4

**Will** +13 +17 against attempts to quiet its singing

</column>

---        

A _singing sword_ is a _+1 [striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [longsword](/Weapons.aspx?ID=31)_ imbued with the consciousness of a boisterous bard, and therefore constantly sings at all times. A singing sword can't stop singing and in fact communicates in no way other than by singing. A successful [Diplomacy](/Skills.aspx?ID=6) or [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) check against its Will DC can convince it to quiet its singing to a whisper for 10 minutes, or 20 minutes on a critical success, though it quickly grows displeased at anyone who attempts this repeatedly. The _singing sword_ can spend its actions to attack on its own, with the effects of a [_dancing_](/Equipment.aspx?ID=293) weapon's activation, except that its attack modifier is +12. Additionally, it can perform the following activations; each casts a [composition](/Traits.aspx?ID=31) spell and follows all the usual rules for compositions.

**Activate—Courageous Anthem** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** The _singing sword_ casts [_courageous anthem_](/Spells.aspx?ID=1763).

**Activate—Rallying Anthem** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per minute;   **Effect** The _singing sword_ casts [rallying anthem](/Feats.aspx?ID=4592).

**Activate—Counter Performance** <actions string="Reaction" /> ([concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per hour; **Trigger** You or an ally within 60 feet rolls a saving throw against an [auditory](/Traits.aspx?ID=16) effect;  **Effect** The _singing sword_ casts [_counter performance_](/Spells.aspx?ID=381).

<column gap="tiny">

</column>
